content.raw: I'd like to be able to un-comment this line and and an EXPECT_EQ line, but because blurring (sub-1 pixel) from the use of a distortion map, a completely undistorted camera (no <distortion> in the SDF) doesn't give the same result as a camera with distortion, but with all the distortion parameters set to 0.
content.html: I'd like to be able to un-comment this line and and an EXPECT_EQ line, but because blurring (sub-1 pixel) from the use of a distortion map, a completely undistorted camera (no <distortion> in the SDF) doesn't give the same result as a camera with distortion, but with all the distortion parameters set to 0.
